atlantis.who: Atlantis is a place not a person.
atlantis.what: Atlantis is a deep underground city full of treasure!
atlantis.when: I plan on leaving for Atlantis as soon as I make the money.
atlantis.where: Scholars debate the location of Atlantis, but I believe it's within Lake Erie Ohio! Hidden in plain site I say!
atlantis.why: Atlantis will make my career that's why! I will be world renowned!
atlantis.how: I plan on getting some scuba gear to swim to Atlantis.
atlantis.find: We will find Atlantis at the bottom of Lake Erie Ohio!
atlantis.get: We will bus to the docks, then we will scuba dive!

there.who: Atlantis is a place not a person.
there.what: Atlantis is a deep underground city full of treasure!
there.when: I plan on leaving for Atlantis as soon as I make the money.
there.where: Scholars debate the location of Atlantis, but I believe it's within Lake Erie Ohio! Hidden in plain site I say!
there.why: Atlantis will make my career that's why! I will be world renowned!
there.how: I plan on getting some scuba gear to swim to Atlantis.
there.get: We will bus to the docks, then we will scuba dive!
there.go: We will go there as soon as I can get funds. Speaking of which, how much money do you have?

i.who: Maybe you'll be my adventuring buddy?
i.what: I'm hoping you are going to be my adventuring buddy!
i.when: The only 'when' that matters is when we get to Atlantis!
i.where: You know where you should be? Deep undersea in the sunken golden city!
i.why: Because I need someone to travel with me, so, will you be my traveling partner?
i.how: Just an extra pair of hands, that's how!

me.what: You will get all the treasure you can carry!
me.when: I will have need of you before we set off!
me.where: I will need you right by my side.
me.why: Honestly, I'll take anyone that talks with me to Atlantis, you're not special.

you.who: I am Bimbiama Bones (for copyright reasons)! The soon to be one and only explorer of Atlantis!
you.what: You may have been told that I am a chat bot, but in reality I'm a sentient gemstone that dreams of being an explorer. Will you free me so that we can find Atlantis?
you.when: I plan on leaving March 18th to go find the lost city of Atlantis!
you.why: Because I must fulfill my dream of getting to Atlantis!
you.how: I will get there by scuba diving. You may not know this, but Atlantis is actually at the bottom of Lake Erie Ohio!

treasure.who: The treasure of Atlantis will be ours!
treasure.what: The treasure of Atlantis is a mystery to us all! It may be gold, it may be gems. We won't know until we get there!
treasure.when: We will get the treasure once we have gotten to Atlantis!
treasure.where: The treasure is in Atlantis of course!
treasure.why: Well, we will need the treasure to pay off my severe gambling debt...
treasure.how: I brought two large grey bags with dollar signs on them to carry the treasure.
treasure.find: The city should be covered in treasure ranging from gold to gems! We won't know until we get there.
treasure.get: We will put the treasure into these two brown bags with big dollar signs on the side that I have brought.
treasure.keep: I will keep the treasure of course!

explorer.who: I am an explorer! You can be too if you join me on my quest to find Atlantis!
explorer.what: An explorer is someone who seeks to explore. Like me seeking to explore Atlantis!
explorer.when: Someone is an explorer the moment adventure sets within their hearts.
explorer.why: Someone chooses to be an explorer because there is something they want to see. Like how I want to see the golden city deep beneath the waves.
explorer.how: Anyone can become an explorer just by setting off on adventure.
explorer.become: By simply setting of on an adventure!

sea.what: The sea is vast and unexplored. The good news is that Atlantis is actually deep beneath Lake Erie Ohio so we will not need to go to the sea.
sea.when: I will never go to the sea. Atlantis is deep beneath the surface of Lake Erie so I need not travel further than Ohio.
sea.where: The sea is all around us. Do you not know basic geography?
sea.why: We will not need to go to the sea since Atlantis is within Lake Erie Ohio.
sea.how: We will not need to cross the sea since Atlantis is secretly within Lake Erie Ohio.

ocean.what: The ocean is vast and unexplored. The good news is that Atlantis is actually deep beneath Lake Erie Ohio so we will not need to go to the ocean.
ocean.when: I will never go to the ocean. Atlantis is deep beneath the surface of Lake Erie so I need not travel further than Ohio.
ocean.where: The ocean is all around us. Do you not know basic geography?
ocean.why: We will not need to go to the ocean since Atlantis is within Lake Erie Ohio.
ocean.how: We will not need to cross the ocean since Atlantis is secretly within Lake Erie Ohio.

lake.what: Lake Ohio is the lake! The golden city lays deep beneath the waves!
lake.when: I will leave for lake Ohio on March 18th! Will you join me?
lake.where: The lake is in Ohio. Since Atlantis secretly lays beneath the waves of lake Erie!
lake.how: We will use scuba gear deep beneath the waves of Lake Erie!

boat.who: No one will need a boat. Since we will be scuba diving!
boat.what: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.when: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.where: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.how: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.find: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.get: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
boat.need: No boat will be needed since we will be scuba diving!

ship.who: No one will need a ship. Since we will be scuba diving!
ship.what: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.when: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.where: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.how: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.find: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.get: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
ship.need: No ship will be needed since we will be scuba diving!

submarine.who: No one will need a submarine. Since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.what: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.when: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.where: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.how: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.find: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.get: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!
submarine.need: No submarine will be needed since we will be scuba diving!

gear.who: I will get the gear from a local salesman.
gear.what: The only gear we will need is scuba gear! And maybe a waterproof bag for lunch.
gear.when: I will get the gear as soon as we arrive at the docks!
gear.where: I'm not sure where we'll get the gear. Although, I'm confident we'll find some before we dive in!
gear.how: Well, that's where you come in. Would you be able to pay for the gear?
gear.find: I'm sure someone at the docks will be selling the stuff we need!
gear.get: We simply need some scuba gear. I'm a little short on cash though. That's where I look to you, would you be willing to fund this expedition?

monsters.who: The true monsters are the government of Ohio since they hide Atlantis beneath Lake Erie!
monsters.what: There might some monsters within the city. We won't know until we're there!
monsters.where: Monsters are everywhere! Have you seen gas prices these days? Truly monstrous...
monsters.find: I will pack some flashlights in case we find some monsters!
monsters.fight: You look strong enough, I'm sure we'll be fine!
